name: Tarkine

features.name: Tarkine Downport
features.description: Routine facilities administered by Oberlindes Lines. No construction, major repair available, unrefined fuel. IISS Scout Base adjacent. Relaxed atmosphere — Law 2.
features.campaignNotes: Patch (Vargr mechanic) works here. Hanne Brekke (Oberlindes) runs port operations.

features.name: Greenholme
features.culture: Main town. Agricultural hub. Small Forinean expat community.
features.description: Largest settlement on Tarkine. Starport-adjacent. Agricultural processing, trade, and the closest thing to a city on this pastoral world. Buildings are low, spread out, surrounded by farmland.
features.campaignNotes: Base of operations for S3. Forinean cultural echo (light) detectable in expat community.

features.name: Tide Reach
features.description: Seaside settlement on Tarkine's temperate coast. Fishing boats, aquaculture pens, fresh seafood. The most visually striking settlement — colorful buildings against blue ocean.
features.campaignNotes: Peaceful contrast scene. Real food, real sky, real water.

features.name: Ember Hollow
features.culture: Inland agricultural community. Ember Church presence.
features.description: Quiet inland settlement near forested hills. The Ember Church maintains a retreat here — meditation halls, flame-lamp gardens. Sister Maren Vosk is based here.
features.campaignNotes: Psionic underground contact point. Von Sydo's spotlight scene. Maren warns about Ghersak.

features.name: Otarri Settlement
features.culture: TL-0 amphibian community. Otarri from Faldor.
features.description: Remote wetland community. Dome-less — the Otarri live in partially submerged structures adapted to Tarkine's shallow marshlands. Primitive by technological standards but sophisticated in ecological understanding.
features.campaignNotes: Max spotlight. Keloru (Otarri who tracks Max) lives here. Pirate scout activity intelligence.

regions.name: The Grasslands
regions.description: Vast rolling grasslands covering Tarkine's temperate zone. Primary agricultural region. Tall grasses adapted to low gravity — some reaching 3 meters. Amber Zone predators lurk here.

regions.name: Shallow Seas
regions.description: Tarkine's warm shallow oceans. Rich marine ecosystem. Aquaculture and fishing sustain coastal communities. The Otarri settlement sits at the edge of the eastern marshlands.

arrivalBriefing:
After the gray ice of Milagro and the industrial haze of Forine, Tarkine is a shock of green. The world fills the viewport with color — blue oceans, green grasslands, white cloud formations against a standard atmosphere sky. The crew can breathe here.

The C-class starport sits beside Greenholme, a low-spread agricultural town that looks tiny against the vast grasslands. There are no domes, no sealed corridors, no recycled air. Just open sky and growing things.

gmQuickRef.population: 3M spread across agricultural communities. No major cities.
gmQuickRef.hazards: Amber Zone wildlife (large predators). Low gravity (0.45G). Otherwise safe.
gmQuickRef.firstImpressions: Green, open, peaceful. Real food, real air, real sky. The relief is palpable after Milagro/Forine.
